title: Assistant Director of Promotions & Fan Engagement - College Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. ™ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Assistant Director of Promotions & Fan Engagement College Sports Posted/Updated: 10-07-2015 Brief Job Description: Responsible for assisting with the marketing and promotions of all 18 intercollegiate athletic sports programs with direct oversight of womens soccer, volleyball, wrestling, and baseball.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
